group_1.narration: You know, I've been thinking@about making some chocolate...

group_1.textLeft: I'm planning on making...

group_1.textRight: What is it, what is it?

group_1.textLeft: [bgEffect:shakeLarge]Chocolate truffles!
Yes!
Since I love mushrooms,@I have to make chocolate truffles!
No, no, they're chocolates.
No, that's different!@Truffles are mushrooms!

group_1.textRight: So there's...a mushroom called a truffle?

group_1.textLeft: Oh...I see what's happening here.
Yes, there's a type of mushroom called a truffle.
Of course!@It's delicious!
After all, it's considered one of the@top three delicacies in the entire world!

group_1.textRight: So, like...@What are the other two delicacies?

group_1.textLeft: Uh...[chara:300101:lipSynch_0][wait:2.0][chara:300101:motion_200][chara:300101:cheek_0][chara:300101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300101:lipSynch_1]caviar and foie gras!

group_1.textRight: ...I have no idea what those things are,@but they sound amazing!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, is that so...@[chara:300101:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:300101:cheek_0][chara:300101:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300101:lipSynch_1]Well, they are amazing!

group_1.textRight: Okay, I'm gonna make that too!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?@What about the mold?

group_1.textRight: Is something, like, wrong with making a@home-base shaped chocolate truffle?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I think that'd be weird...

group_1.textRight: Okay, I'm gonna make it anyway!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? You want to try it?
The recipe...
I haven't looked it up yet!
Ahaha...
But, well, it probably involves chocolate!

group_1.textRight: ...So, uh, where do you buy truffles?

group_1.textLeft: Truffles?@Like the mushrooms?
Well, you can find them online@or at luxury grocery stores...

group_1.textRight: Hold up, luxury grocery stores?@Are they expensive?!

group_1.textLeft: Well, they're one of the top three delicacies,@after all.
Oh, you want to have a truffle?

group_1.textRight: Right!@Cause...if I'm gonna make chocolate truffles...
I'm gonna have to, like, get one for myself, right?

group_1.textLeft: (Right, it'll be hard to shape it@correctly without ever seeing one...)
Oh, that reminds me!
Since you're so interested in mushrooms...
I've got some facts you should know!
Well, you know...
